allresources.title: Business Model Canvas
allresources.paragraphtext: A business model canvas is a strategic tool used to quickly and easily define and communicate a business idea or concept.

allresources.title: ABC of Business Accounting
allresources.paragraphtext: The importance of Startup Founders having their accounting books right and various source documents that every business must have.

allresources.title: Nigerian Startup ACTS
allresources.paragraphtext: As a Founder, how much do you know about the Startup Act and its enormous benefits to you as a Business Owner?

allresources.title: Keeping accounting records
allresources.paragraphtext: You don't have to have a full-time accountant working in your business if you can't afford it yet. All you need to do is to meticulously keep the basic records, and then you can have an accountant on your retainer.

growingyourbusiness.title: ABC of Business Accounting
growingyourbusiness.paragraphtext: The importance of Startup Founders having their accounting books right and various source documents that every business must have.
